sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		Cpty_LinkFlag as string,
		VPC as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		CREATED_DATE as string,
		MAKE_ID as string,
		OnHold as string,
		TRANSPORT_TYPE as string,
		TRANSPORT as string,
		AIRPORTINVENTORY as string,
		CapacityVariance as string,
		SIT as string,
		UNSHIPPABLECAPACITY as string,
		PCTUNSHIPPABLECAPACITY as string,
		UnassignedTotal as string,
		AssignedShippable as string,
		OceanCapacity as string,
		RailCapacity as string,
		TruckCapacity as string,
		EOM as string,
		OCEANASSIGNREQDTOSHIP as string,
		TRUCKASSIGNREQDTOSHIP as string,
		RAILASSIGNREQDTOSHIP as string,
		BRAND as string,
		CUSTOMER as string,
		UNASSIGNED_PERCENT_OCEAN as string,
		UNASSIGNED_PERCENT_RAIL as string,
		UNASSIGNED_PERCENT_TRUCK as string,
		CapacityConstant as string,
		Cpty_LinkDate as string,
		InTransitAssignedVPCProj as string,
		InTransitPastAssignedVPCProj as string,
		Cpty_LinkFlag as string,
		VPC as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		CREATED_DATE as string,
		MAKE_ID as string,
		OnHold as string,
		TRANSPORT_TYPE as string,
		TRANSPORT as string,
		AIRPORTINVENTORY as string,
		CapacityVariance as string,
		SIT as string,
		UNSHIPPABLECAPACITY as string,
		PCTUNSHIPPABLECAPACITY as string,
		UnassignedTotal as string,
		AssignedShippable as string,
		OceanCapacity as string,
		RailCapacity as string,
		TruckCapacity as string,
		EOM as string,
		OCEANASSIGNREQDTOSHIP as string,
		TRUCKASSIGNREQDTOSHIP as string,
		RAILASSIGNREQDTOSHIP as string,
		BRAND as string,
		CUSTOMER as string,
		UNASSIGNED_PERCENT_OCEAN as string,
		UNASSIGNED_PERCENT_RAIL as string,
		UNASSIGNED_PERCENT_TRUCK as string,
		CapacityConstant as string,
		Cpty_LinkDate as string,
		InTransitAssignedVPCProj as string,
		InTransitPastAssignedVPCProj as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		Cpty_LinkFlag,
		VPC,
		Org_ID,
		CUST_ID,
		VPC_ID,
		LOCATION_ID,
		CREATED_DATE,
		MAKE_ID,
		OnHold,
		TRANSPORT_TYPE,
		TRANSPORT,
		AIRPORTINVENTORY,
		CapacityVariance,
		SIT,
		UNSHIPPABLECAPACITY,
		PCTUNSHIPPABLECAPACITY,
		UnassignedTotal,
		AssignedShippable,
		OceanCapacity,
		RailCapacity,
		TruckCapacity,
		EOM,
		OCEANASSIGNREQDTOSHIP,
		TRUCKASSIGNREQDTOSHIP,
		RAILASSIGNREQDTOSHIP,
		BRAND,
		CUSTOMER,
		UNASSIGNED_PERCENT_OCEAN,
		UNASSIGNED_PERCENT_RAIL,
		UNASSIGNED_PERCENT_TRUCK,
		CapacityConstant,
		Cpty_LinkDate,
		InTransitAssignedVPCProj,
		InTransitPastAssignedVPCProj
	)) ~> ADONETDestination
